column3: Library enables to call Microsoft Windows operating system shortcuts as a text.
When specific application window is active, keys can be triggered even when no text input box is available.

column1: *Z‖markleftcopy`n‖SI‖En‖{shift down}{control down}{left}{control up}{shift up}{control down}c{control up}‖
*Z‖markrightcopy`n‖SI‖En‖{shift down}{control down}{right}{control up}{shift up}{control down}c{control up}‖
*Z‖winlock`n‖SI‖En‖{lwin down}l{lwin up}‖this will not work (Keyboard Hook ver. operating system)
